5. The repeated "PffBB-10:PC71BM" in the list seems to be a typo, and it should be "PffBB-16:PC71BM" for the last property value. So, "2.2 nm" is also a property value referring to the root-mean-square (rms) roughness of active layer films for PffBB-16:PC71BM.

In summary, the property values in the paragraph are: 2.6 nm, 1.8 nm, 1.0 nm, and 2.2 nm, all referring to the root-mean-square (rms) roughness of active layer films for different blends.
